items.title: 谷歌Gemini人工智能将登陆电视端
items.raw_excerpt: 谷歌的人工智能助手 Gemini 即将登陆电视端。本周一，谷歌宣布将为 Google TV推出 Gemini 功能，电视用户可通过该功能与人工智能进行流畅自然的语言对话。（新浪财经）

title_i18n.zh: 谷歌Gemini人工智能将登陆电视端
title_i18n.en: Google's Gemini AI is coming to television.
title_i18n.es: El inteligente artificial Google Gemini llegará a los televisores.

excerpt_i18n.zh: 谷歌的人工智能助手 Gemini 即将登陆电视端。本周一，谷歌宣布将为 Google TV推出 Gemini 功能，电视用户可通过该功能与人工智能进行流畅自然的语言对话。（新浪财经）
excerpt_i18n.en: Google's AI assistant Gemini is coming to television. On Monday, Google announced it will introduce Gemini functionality to Google TV, allowing users to engage in smooth, natural language conversations with the AI.
excerpt_i18n.es: El asistente de inteligencia artificial de Google, Gemini, llegará próximamente a los televisores. Este lunes, Google anunció que introducirá la función Gemini en Google TV, permitiendo a los usuarios mantener conversaciones fluidas y naturales con la inteligencia artificial mediante comandos de voz. (Sina Finance)

items.title: Show HN: Perfect your presentation with a panel of AI reviewers
items.raw_excerpt: Hi HN! We (Thorntale) are a startup building presentation tools, we noticed that while people disliked the tedium of making slide decks, a lot of people actively dread presenting those decks, especially if it's a high-stakes call or if they're inexperienced. Speaking from experience, practice helps a lot, but it can feel embarrassing to give the same pitch to your friend or cofounder for the tenth time. We built this prototype https://review.thorntale.com/ as a way to practice; upload a PDF deck, give your presentation, and the selected AI "personas" will analyze the slides and transcript and provide feedback. At the moment, we've tuned "personas" to give you feedback from the perspective of an investor, a teacher, or a marketing/branding lead (as well as a few entertaining extras.) If you

items.title: A ‘global call for AI red lines’ sounds the alarm about the lack of international AI policy
items.raw_excerpt: On Monday, more than 200 former heads of state, diplomats, Nobel laureates, AI leaders, scientists, and others all agreed on one thing: There should be an international agreement on “red lines” that AI should never cross — for instance, not allowing AI to impersonate a human being or self-replicate.  They, along with more than 70 organizations […]

title_i18n.en: A ‘global call for AI red lines’ sounds the alarm about the lack of international AI policy
title_i18n.zh: 全球人工智能红线倡议对国际人工智能政策缺失敲响警钟
title_i18n.es: Una llamada global por líneas rojas en la inteligencia artificial alerta sobre la falta de políticas internacionales en IA.

excerpt_i18n.en: On Monday, more than 200 former heads of state, diplomats, Nobel laureates, AI leaders, scientists, and others all agreed on one thing: There should be an international agreement on “red lines” that AI should never cross — for instance, not allowing AI to impersonate a human being or self-replicate.  They, along with more than 70 organizations […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 周一，超过200位前国家元首、外交官、诺贝尔奖得主、人工智能领域领袖及科学家等人士达成共识：应制定国际协议，明确人工智能不可逾越的"红线"。
excerpt_i18n.es: El lunes, más de doscientos exjefes de estado, diplomáticos, premios Nobel, líderes en inteligencia artificial, científicos y otros estuvieron de acuerdo en una cosa: debería existir un acuerdo internacional sobre "líneas rojas" que la IA nunca debería cruzar.

items.title: 手机秒变学习机，百度搜索正式推出 AI 伴学功能
items.raw_excerpt: 雷峰网讯 ﻿9 月 22 日，百度搜索教育新品交流会在北京中关村学说空间举办。会上正式推出 AI 伴学产品，其中包括 AI 精准练、AI 口语等重磅功能。产品入口目前集成于百度 App 内，据官方介绍，此举意在“让普通手机一键变身免费学习机，助力教育平权”。 AI 教育产品百花齐放，产品形态选择独立软件还是专门硬件，各个厂商招数不一。对于百度来说， 把教育产品集成在百度 App 内部，或许正是目前的全局最优解。 虽然是陪伴孩子，但 AI 伴学产品最初的用户往往是家长。从年龄来看，这部分人群和百度 App 的用户画像有所重合，用户迁移成本几乎为零。在此基础上，集成模块的产品形态又省去了实体学习机必然带来的硬件成本，真正实现了让家长无痛使用的产品体验。 产品功能方面，这款「学习机」除了拥有国内主流教材视频讲解、各地区小初高模拟题真题等海量优质学习资源，搭载独家的 AI 精准练、AI 口语、AI 作文批改等一系列精心打磨过的 AI 教育产品，还可以设置家长模式，实时掌控孩子的学习情况。 在 AI 伴学模式下，百度 App 首页原有的信息流会被“拍照搜题”、“在线答疑”等功能取代，且家长可通过设置密码等方式进行锁定，避免了孩子使用手机的过程中分心。 其中，AI 精准练是集「作业批改、学情分析、巩固练习 」三大能力于一体的个性化学习工具，旨在帮助孩子实现「知对错-找薄弱-促提升」的高效学习循环，支持小初高全学段、全学科题目检索，而且向家长学生全部免费开放使用。 值得一提的是，百度此前发布的数字人技术也在直播电商之外找到了新的用武之地，即此次同步推出的 AI 口语功能。 据介绍，为了打磨这些 AI 功能，百度教育团队专门研发了一套更聪明、更高效的模型，依托文心 4.5、DeepSeek 等底座大模型、百度文本检索引擎及自建知识图谱，实现了全流程智能化、个性化、精准化。 雷峰网文章

title_i18n.es: El móvil se convierte al instante en un asistente de estudio, Baidu Search lanza oficialmente la función de acompañamiento educativo con IA.

excerpt_i18n.en:
On September 22, Leifeng News reported that Baidu Search held an education product launch event at the Zhongguancun Learning Space in Beijing. The event officially introduced an AI learning companion product, featuring key functions such as AI precision exercises and AI speaking practice. The product is currently integrated within the Baidu App, with the official aim to "turn an ordinary smartphone into a free learning device with one click, promoting educational equity." 

As AI education products flourish, companies vary in their approaches—some opt for standalone software, others for dedicated hardware. For Baidu, integrating the education product into its app may be the optimal solution. Although designed to accompany children, the initial users of the AI learning companion are often parents. This demographic overlaps with Baidu App's user profile, minimizing migration costs. Additionally, the integrated module eliminates hardware expenses associated with physical learning devices, offering a seamless experience for parents.

Functionally, this "learning device" includes video explanations aligned with national textbooks, a vast library of practice tests for primary to high school levels across regions, and exclusive AI features like precision exercises, speaking practice, and essay grading. It also offers a parent mode for real-time monitoring of children's progress. In AI companion mode, the Baidu App homepage replaces its standard information feed with features like "photo-based problem search" and "online Q&A," allowing parents to oversee learning activities.
excerpt_i18n.es: El 22 de septiembre, Leifeng Net informó que la conferencia de intercambio sobre nuevos productos educativos de Baidu Search se celebró en el espacio académico de Zhongguancun, Beijing. En el evento se lanzó oficialmente el producto de acompañamiento educativo con IA, que incluye funciones destacadas como ejercicios precisos con IA y práctica oral con IA. La entrada al producto está actualmente integrada en la aplicación de Baidu. Según la presentación oficial, el objetivo es "transformar un teléfono común en una herramienta de aprendizaje gratuita con un solo clic, promoviendo la equidad educativa". Los productos educativos con IA están floreciendo, y cada fabricante elige diferentes enfoques, ya sea como software independiente o hardware especializado. Para Baidu, integrar el producto educativo dentro de su aplicación parece ser la solución óptima actual. Aunque está diseñado para acompañar a los niños, la IA

items.title: 全球AI云战场开打： 微软云、AWS 向左，谷歌、阿里云向右
items.raw_excerpt: 最近，几乎每位出差的人都会有同感：“北上广的机场核心位置，几乎被各大 AI 云厂商占满了！” 在云计算的赛道上，AI 云已经成为新一轮的入场券。它不仅关乎算力，更决定厂商能否摆脱价格战泥潭、重建护城河，以及在全球科技牌桌上争得一席之地。因此，过去两年里，国内云厂商在战略、组织等各个环节都全力投入，争夺市场领先地位的竞争愈发激烈，“第一”的争夺成为行业关注的核心。 对于大厂来说，“AI 云第一”不仅是数字排名，更是一种行业认可和市场号召力。谁能贴上这个标签，谁就更容易吸引客户、赢得市场份额。 但如果把眼光放宽点，在全球范围内，AI云的竞争格局更激烈，如今只剩4朵超级AI云：美国的AWS、微软和谷歌，以及中国的阿里云。 AI云不等于模型调用 谁是 AI 云 “第一”？取决于评判标准。不同群体基于不同视角，答案也各不相同。 有部分人认为，模型是评判AI云第一的核心要素。 理由也很简单，企业最终是要用模型来解决问题的，客户会用脚投票。尤其是在当下，很多公司都陷入了“AI焦虑”，迫切希望模型能真正帮上忙。谁的模型能不断迭代升级，在不同场景里都能答得准、算得快、还能带来新思路，谁就更容易在AI云的竞争中脱颖而出。 火山引擎所强调的“调用量”，其实也是这一逻辑的延伸——通过高频调用，来侧面证明其模型的成熟度与市场接受度。 但雷峰网认为，如果从市场规模上看，以模型调用为主的MaaS市场，远比不上千亿级别的云计算市场。更重要的是，如果从长远来看，随着AI应用进入更深层次的产业化阶段，要构建一朵真正的超级AI云，仅靠模型表现远远不够。 这就像一座大厦，地基坚实、结构完整，才能在风雨中稳固屹立，并为未来扩建和升级提供可靠支撑。因此，未来要真正评估谁才是AI 云第一，必须经历这四大硬核拷问： 第一，每年是否有千亿级的基础设施投入？ AI云真正的门槛不是宣传口号，而是实打实的资金实力。今年头部云厂商

excerpt_i18n.en: Recently, almost every business traveler would agree: "The prime advertising spaces in Beijing, Shanghai, and Guangzhou airports are almost entirely occupied by major AI cloud providers!" In the race of cloud computing, AI cloud has become the new entry ticket. It not only concerns computing power but also determines whether providers can escape the price war, rebuild their competitive moats, and secure a place at the global tech table. As a result, over the past two years, domestic cloud providers have invested heavily in strategy, organization, and every other aspect, intensifying the competition for market leadership, with the battle for "first place" becoming the industry's focal point. For major players, being "number one in AI cloud" is not just a numerical ranking but also industry recognition and market influence. Whoever claims this title finds it easier to attract clients and gain market share. However, broadening the perspective globally, the competition in AI cloud is even fiercer, now narrowed down to four super AI clouds: AWS, Microsoft, and Google from the U.S., along with China's Alibaba Cloud. AI cloud is not just about model access. Who is "first" in AI cloud? It depends on the criteria. Different groups, from different viewpoints, have varying answers. Some believe the model is the core factor in judging AI cloud leadership. The reasoning is straightforward: businesses ultimately use models to solve problems, and clients vote with their feet. Especially now, many companies are experiencing "AI anxiety," urgently hoping models can genuinely assist. Whose models can continuously iterate, deliver accurate and fast results across various scenarios, and offer innovative approaches will more likely lead in AI cloud.
excerpt_i18n.es: Últimamente, casi cualquier persona que viaje por trabajo comparte la misma impresión: "¡Las ubicaciones centrales de los aeropuertos de Beijing, Shanghái y Cantón están prácticamente copadas por los principales proveedores de nube de IA!" En la carrera de la computación en la nube, la nube de IA se ha convertido en la nueva credencial de acceso. No solo se trata de capacidad de cálculo, sino que también determina si los proveedores pueden escapar del pantano de la guerra de precios, reconstruir su ventaja competitiva y ganar un lugar en la mesa global de tecnología. Por ello, en los últimos dos años, los proveedores nacionales de nube han invertido a fondo en todos los aspectos, desde la estrategia hasta la organización, y la competencia por el liderazgo del mercado se ha intensificado cada vez más, convirtiéndose la lucha por el "primer puesto" en el centro de atención de la industria. Para los grandes actores, ser "el número uno en nube de IA" no es solo una clasificación numérica, sino también un reconocimiento del sector y un poder de convocatoria en el mercado.

items.title: 硅基流动入局企业级 MaaS，重写大模型落地叙事

excerpt_i18n.en:
By 2025, AI large models have entered a critical phase of transitioning from "proof of concept" to "value realization." More and more enterprises are beginning to consider that large models must not only be usable but also genuinely enhance business efficiency and ensure controllable costs. Against this backdrop, Silicon-based Flow has launched an enterprise-grade MaaS platform. As an end-to-end solution covering computing resource management, model training, inference deployment, and scenario application, it addresses the five core challenges in the industrialization of large models: adaptation speed, performance versus cost, reliability, quality, and security and compliance. It not only helps enterprises overcome key hurdles in implementation but also provides the industry with a scalable and replicable intelligent infrastructure. 

Addressing the Five Major Challenges of Large Model Deployment
In the industrialization of large models, enterprises commonly face five challenges: model adaptation, inference performance and cost, service reliability, output quality, and security and compliance. Silicon-based Flow's enterprise MaaS platform offers systematic solutions to these pain points:
- Rapid integration and one-click deployment: Pre-integrated with 100+ mainstream open-source and proprietary large models, combined with various computing card inference acceleration packages, enabling out-of-the-box use. Leveraging Silicon-based Flow's public cloud capabilities, new models can be adapted and synchronized to private enterprise environments in as little as 1–3 days, significantly shortening deployment cycles.
- Balancing high performance and low cost: Achieves optimal balance between performance and cost through intelligent routing, self-developed inference frameworks, and dynamic scaling. Context-aware, KV Cache-aware, LoRA...
excerpt_i18n.es: En 2025, los grandes modelos de IA han entrado en una fase crucial de pasar de la "prueba de concepto" a la "materialización de valor". Cada vez más empresas empiezan a considerar que estos modelos no solo deben ser utilizables, sino que también deben mejorar realmente la eficiencia operativa y controlar los costes. En este contexto, Silicone Flow ha lanzado una plataforma MaaS empresarial. Como solución integral que abarca desde la gestión de recursos computacionales y el entrenamiento de modelos hasta el despliegue de inferencias y aplicaciones prácticas, aborda las cinco contradicciones clave de la industrialización de los grandes modelos: velocidad de adaptación, rendimiento versus coste, fiabilidad, calidad, y seguridad y cumplimiento normativo. No solo ayuda a las empresas a resolver los desafíos críticos durante la implementación, sino que también proporciona a la industria una infraestructura inteligente escalable y replicable.

items.title: TADA: Improved Diffusion Sampling with Training-free Augmented Dynamics
items.raw_excerpt: Diffusion models have demonstrated exceptional capabilities in generating high-fidelity images but typically suffer from inefficient sampling. Many solver designs and noise scheduling strategies have been proposed to dramatically improve sampling speeds. In this paper, we introduce a new sampling method that is up to 186% faster than the current state of the art solver for comparative FID on ImageNet512. This new sampling method is training-free and uses an ordinary differential equation (ODE) solver. The key to our method resides in using higher-dimensional initial noise, allowing to produce…

items.title: On Inductive Biases That Enable Generalization of Diffusion Transformers
items.raw_excerpt: Recent work studying the generalization of diffusion models with UNet-based denoisers reveals inductive biases that can be expressed via geometry-adaptive harmonic bases. However, in practice, more recent denoising networks are often based on transformers, e.g., the diffusion transformer (DiT). This raises the question: do transformer-based denoising networks exhibit inductive biases that can also be expressed via geometry-adaptive harmonic bases? To our surprise, we find that this is not the case. This discrepancy motivates our search for the inductive bias that can lead to good…

items.title: Discrete Neural Flow Samplers with Locally Equivariant Transformer
items.raw_excerpt: Sampling from unnormalised discrete distributions is a fundamental problem across various domains. While Markov chain Monte Carlo offers a principled approach, it often suffers from slow mixing and poor convergence. In this paper, we propose Discrete Neural Flow Samplers (DNFS), a trainable and efficient framework for discrete sampling. DNFS learns the rate matrix of a continuous-time Markov chain such that the resulting dynamics satisfy the Kolmogorov equation. As this objective involves the intractable partition function, we then employ control variates to reduce the variance of its Monte…

items.title: UniGen: Enhanced Training & Test-Time Strategies for Unified Multimodal Understanding and Generation
items.raw_excerpt: We introduce UniGen, a unified multimodal large language model (MLLM) capable of image understanding and generation. We study the full training pipeline of UniGen from a data-centric perspective, including multi-stage pre-training, supervised fine-tuning, and direct preference optimization. More importantly, we propose a new Chain-of-Thought Verification (CoT-V) strategy for test-time scaling, which significantly boosts UniGen’s image generation quality using a simple Best-of-N test-time strategy. Specifically, CoT-V enables UniGen to act as both image generator and verifier at test time…

items.title: Follow the Energy, Find the Path: Riemannian Metrics from Energy-Based Models
items.raw_excerpt: What is the shortest path between two data points lying in a high-dimensional space? While the answer is trivial in Euclidean geometry, it becomes significantly more complex when the data lies on a curved manifold — requiring a Riemannian metric to describe the space’s local curvature. Estimating such a metric, however, remains a major challenge in high dimensions. In this work, we propose a method for deriving Riemannian metrics directly from pretrained Energy-Based Models (EBMs) — a class of generative models that assign low energy to high-density regions. These metrics define spatially…
